identifier.identifier: biosharing id will be available soon

name: Tycho Dataset Format
description: Project Tycho 2.0 datasets include counts of cases for conditions (i.e. disorders) in countries reported by health agencies. These counts can be specified for different geographical regions within a country, for different time intervals, for various age ranges and/or subpopulations, and can represent fatalities (deaths) or not. Each datafile includes variables to specify the attributes of each count, as indicated below. Counts may not be available for all locations and time periods; missing information is indicated as "NA".
